title: Dinner Tonight: Broccoli Rabe And Sausage Pasta
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Dinner Tonight: Broccoli Rabe And Sausage Pastan a try. This recipe serves 5 and costs $1.35 per serving. One serving contains 663 calories, 26g of protein, and 30g of fat. 4 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free diet. If you have broccoli rabe, pasta, cheese to grate, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. Only a few people really liked this Mediterranean dish. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 88%. This score is amazing. Try Dinner Tonight: Baked Rigatoni with Italian Sausage and Broccoli Rabe, Dinner Tonight: Broccoli Rabe with Asian Flavors, and Dinner Tonight: Broccoli Rabe With Pepperoni And Breadcrumbs for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Italian works really well with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. One wine you could try is Casan Emma Chianti Classico. It has 4.8 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 21 dollars.

productMatches.title: Casa Emma Chianti Classico
productMatches.description: Casa Emma Chianti Classico D.O.C.G is an elegant wine with a floreal bouquet and cherry hints. It has a balanced freshness, good structure and velvety tannins. Aged for 1 year in 500 liter barrels, it has an intense ruby red color with purple reflections. With a lingering finish with good acidity and minerality, it is perfect to pair with pasta and cold cuts.
